divs: Sighting Detailswalked out side to smoke and saw this bright flashing blue green red pulsing object in the Eastern sky above town. Also 3 others people watched this with me. I am a trained ex-police officer and have NEVER seen anything like this. the object moved, well it still is right now..very slowly in a West South West. None of us that are watching this thing have ever seen anything like it. It is low in the sky and very bright flashing blue to green to blue then red. I am going back out to watch it. I have no camera that works so no pics,sorry.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Green River
There were no other sightings in Green River on or around January 20th 2009
